name: Roll With It (Bread&JamGames, Lanzalot, Zapton52)
description:
"Roll with it" is a 2D isometric game where you control a dice to reach the goal. The distance you travel on each move is completely randomized.

Controls:         

1) WASD to pick direction. (Shown on bottom rightmost dice)

2) Click space to confirm to move a random distance

3) Get to the Flag to move to the next level

Credits:

Music: doodle by StumpyStrust.
